thread.title: Cozy hotel in a good location
thread.title_full: Cozy hotel in a good location - Review of Hotel Diva Opera, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: cqth
title: Cozy hotel in a good location
text: First time in Paris and spend 5 nights in this hotel in Feb. The staff were friendly and helpful. Rooms were adequate and a surprise that the bathroom feature a long bath. There is a lot of eateries around the vicinity and it is within walking distance to many places of interest such as the sacred coeur, the lourve and shopping district of Hausmann Boulevard. Would definitely recommend this hotel to people who wants to explore Paris.
